授業目的: This course aims to enhance students’ ability: to aware of, identify and analysing cultural phenomena, issues and problems in a globalizing / conflicting world, for promoting multi-cultural diversity and multi-culturalism for sustainable future.
到達目標:
* Students can identify cultural issues, problems and contradictions and policy initiatives to promote multi-culturalism in a globalizing / conflicting world.
* Each student must demonstrate the learning from, as well as beyond, taught lessons and extra-curricular activity (homework and field observation) - Final Repot with firstly: 3 Reviews on literature review and media (video-documentary) and more importantly, Mini-Project Report (4500 words) - compatible with academic / policy paper standard.
特記事項: 【合併】Comparative Culture（総合政策学部）/比較文化論（総合政策学部）
